review: This is a great gizmo and works pretty well; however it is limited to streaming only certain apps or channels from your notebook, tablet, etc. I originally thought it would reflect everything your tablet displays, i.e. every app or website. Other than this, the product is quite user-friendly. Perhaps the next generation will overcome this limitation?
author: A. J. Stavsky

review: NO more useless channels for me. This is it! I am free!I am just so happy that I bought this little fella the Google Chromecast HDMI Streaming Media Player. Should be called Google Easycast.-You just plug it to the HDMI connection on the side or back of your tv. Mine was a little tight and I used the extension that came in the box.-Downloaded the Chromecast App to all my devices (Android phone Atrix 4G and tablet Asus memo pad hd7)-Paired with your device. Enter the code you see in your HDTV or any tv with an HDMI connection, in your device.-Name your Chromecast-Start watching Free skippable Ad Channels on Youtube.

review: Works great after I corrected a WIFI password issue.  Cannot connect to a secure network with more than a 63 character password.  Not an issue for most people but I'm paranoid; I like long passwords.  Shortened it to 63 characters and now it works just fine.
